books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A novel about the American dream, love, and loss in 1920s New York.
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

books.title: War and Peace
books.description: A historical novel set during the Napoleonic wars, following the lives of several aristocratic families.
books.author: Leo Tolstoy

books.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance to control the populace.
books.author: George Orwell

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry of the early 19th century.
books.author: Jane Austen

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A story about the struggles of adolescence, mental health, and identity.
books.author: J.D. Salinger

books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: A fantasy novel about a hobbit's journey to help reclaim a treasure from a dragon.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South during the 1930s, told through the eyes of a young girl.
books.author: Harper Lee

books.title: Brave New World
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a futuristic society where technology and conformity control human behavior.
books.author: Aldous Huxley
